ithin dan kalpana karanawa yanawada nadda ...kohoma hari mage nohikmunu saha lajja nathi kama jaya gaththa...hodatama winadi 20 ithiri kara ganna puluwan kiyala dan pahalata giya.mata kalin aapu eka gihin me wenakota .mamath himita oya umage kata lagata aawa.homba athulata danakotama ara kalin aapu wahane nathara karala.ekaparatama podi sakayak aawa, parakku wadi menna innawa biththiyatama heththu karala nawaththapu polis jip ekak.dan mata kata uththara na.eka dakapu gaman nawaththuwa.othana parak na walla thiyanne ithin yanawa nam ikmanata yanna oona erenne nathi wenna.

mita pera suparman kendra kotagath kisidu nirmanayak bihi nowu gananata siya chithrapataye nirmana katayuthuwalata atha gasu snayidar hata awashya wuye 'supar man' namathi shirsha patayen mema supiri wirayawa pitathata ganimayi.suparman padaka kotagath mithya kathawa arthakathanayakin yuthuwa idiripath kieema sadaha chithrapataye aarambhaka miniththu wissa kapa kalada,sankshipthayen idiripath kerena 'kriptan' grahalowa pilibada hadinwimath,suwisha shi hakiyawen uruma karagath ladaru supar man pruthiwiyata ewanu labana andamath,suparman ge piyage parama sathura wana jenaral sod (mayikal shanon) asadharana andamin,kisiseth ma prekshakaya balaporoththu nowu idiripath kirimak nowana bawa kiwa yuthu we.
